name: Debate Simulator 2016
description:
Made for the 2018 Winter Awful Jam.  

Are you a bad enough orator to grab the presidency by the p***y?

Donations are optional and not advised but will be split 50/50 with the artist (Scut And Destroy).

Check out the artist's twitter account here: https://twitter.com/scutanddestroy?s=09

See the rest of the Winter 2018 Jam Games here: http://www.awfuljams.com/winter-2018/games

See the developer's homepage here: https://www.josephcatrambone.com/?p=1080
